revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} '''[[Structs:SecPlane|SecPlane]]'''
native double '''PointToDist'''(Vector2 ''xy'', double ''z'') const
==Usage== Gets the SecPlane's distance from the world origin at the given map coordinates. Useful when trying to calculate a destination distance to move to.
===Parameters=== *''xy'' - The absolute xy map coordinates to use. Generally the '''centerspot''' of the SecPlane's sector is used. *''z'' - The absolute z map coordinate to use.
===Return Value=== Returns the SecPlane's distance from the world origin at the point.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:SecPlane]]
